mapper.sql: select t.client_id, t.product_season_yanfa, t.product_season_caigou, t.product_season_xiaoshou, t.product_season_shengchan, t.is_autodisplay_price_in_stock_other, t.is_autodisplay_price_out_stock_other, t.is_pandian_approval, t.vendor_enter_request_in_stock_other, t.customer_enter_request_in_stock_other, t.vendor_enter_request_out_stock_other, t.customer_enter_request_out_stock_other, t.price_enter_request_in_stock_other, t.price_enter_request_out_stock_other, t.is_process_work_center_editable, t.is_required_concern_task, t.is_product_contract_date_identical, t.is_auto_update_process_status, t.is_auto_update_concern_task_status, t.is_associate_latest_manufacture_order, t.is_in_defective_price_tax_equal_to_price_tax, t.erp_material_sku_enter_mode_project, t.product_code_enter_mode_project, t.purchase_order_contract_enter_mode, t.sale_order_contract_enter_mode, t.man_outsource_settle_contract_enter_mode, t.is_query_other_user, t.is_xiefu_industry, t.dianqian_exceed_notice_account, t.toexpire_days_ldht, t.toexpire_days_syq, t.toexpire_days_cght, t.toexpire_days_cgdd, t4.toexpire_days_cgdd as toexpire_days_cgdd_sys, t.toexpire_days_xsht, t.toexpire_days_xsdd, t4.toexpire_days_xsdd as toexpire_days_xsdd_sys, t.toexpire_days_scdd, t.toexpire_days_scdd_gx, t.toexpire_days_scdd_sp, t.toexpire_days_scdd_sx, t.toexpire_days_project, t.toexpire_days_prj_task, t.todo_days_prj_task, t.toexpire_days_gzzrx, t.toexecute_notice_days_prj_task, t.notice_type_pre_task_incomplete, t.notice_type_process_price_inconsistent, t.notice_type_pur_require_to_order_excess, t.is_auto_set_project_status, t.is_required_product_season_product, t.is_required_up_down_suit_product, t.is_required_model_product, t.is_required_product_technique_type_product, t.is_required_sku2_group_product, t.is_required_vendor_material, t.is_required_unit_quantity_material, t.is_required_quote_price_tax_material, t.is_required_purchase_order_contract, t.quote_price_associate_dimension_purchase_price, t.is_required_sale_order_contract, t.is_workflow_purchase_require, t.is_workflow_tughzd, t.is_workflow_yangpcsd, t.is_workflow_yangpzsd, t.is_workflow_shijsjd, t.is_workflow_wenapsd, t.is_workflow_shixjhd, t.is_workflow_shixjgd, t.is_required_material_type_gysdzd, t.is_required_material_type_khdzd, t.shoukuan_account_clear_way, t.fukuan_account_clear_way, t.is_attach_required_shoukuan, t.is_attach_required_fukuan, t.is_workflow_fk, t.is_workflow_sk, t.is_workflow_khkk, t.is_workflow_gyskk, t.is_workflow_khyj, t.is_workflow_gysyj, t.is_workflow_khzyk, t.is_workflow_gyszyk, t.is_workflow_yfzgtjld, t.is_workflow_yszgtjld, t.is_auto_set_project_task_status, t.purchase_finance_account, t.sale_finance_account, t.is_sale_price_associate_customer, t.is_enable_esign, t.wpc_remind_days, t.personnel_mgt_notice_account, t.sale_dpc_notice_account, t.handle_status, t.creator_account, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.update_date, t.logon_timeout, t2.nick_name AS creator_account_name, t3.nick_name AS updater_account_name, u4.user_id as sale_dpc_notice_account_id from s_sys_default_setting_client t LEFT JOIN sys_user t2 ON t2.user_name = t.creator_account and t2.client_id = t.client_id LEFT JOIN sys_user t3 ON t3.user_name = t.updater_account and t3.client_id = t.client_id left join s_sys_default_setting_system t4 on t4.client_id='10000' LEFT JOIN sys_user u4 ON t.sale_dpc_notice_account = u4.user_name and t.client_id = u4.client_id
mapper.insert:
